library(tidyverse)

## Import Date
```{r}
cdi = read_csv("cdi.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  mutate(crm_1000 = 1000*(crimes/pop))
```

# summary continuous variables
```{r}
cdi%>%
select(area, pop,pop18,pop65,docs,beds,crimes,hsgrad,bagrad,poverty,unemp,pcincome,totalinc,crm_1000) %>%
summary()

```
